descriptions.content: g.yang chog, g.yang khug gi cho ga, g.yang ‘gugs, phywa g.yang ‘gugs pa’i cho ga, g.yang sgrub [TBRC = properity rituals = T22] Ex: Tshe ring ma'i phrin las la brten nas tshe g.yang sgrub pa'i cho ga bkra shis gter mdzod (W22849), Rnam sras la brten nas phywa g.yang ‘gugs chog (W16177).
